data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

I don't think it's a ____ bet ____ yet. The ____ of ____ leaving ____ pretty ____. But ____ are ____ lots ____ other ____ that ____ is ____ likely ____ land ____. data.fullContent: Betters are putting their money on the proposition that T.J. will leave his current team and move to our city's team for the upcoming season. I don't think it's a safe bet just yet. The likelihood of his leaving seems pretty high. But there are actually lots of other teams that he is more likely to land with. For his part, he's showing unprecedented discretion in not revealing his plans yet.
data.answer: 更有希望的是，T.J.将会离开他现在的球队，在即将到来的赛季转会到我们城市的球队。我不认为这是一个安全的赌注。他离开的可能性似乎很高。但实际上还有很多其他球队他更有可能与之签约。对他来说，他还没有透露自己的计划，这显示了他前所未有的谨慎。
